Post:
Here's how to vote in 
@Tesla
's shareholder meeting:

For $TSLA shareholders who use Fidelity:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). The email may come from one of several different addresses. Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚ÄúTesla‚Äù, ‚Äú
http://
Fidelity.Investments.email@shareholderdocs.fidelity.com‚Äù, ‚Äúe-notification@edocs.mybrokerageinfo.com‚Äù, or ‚Äúid@proxyvote.com‚Äù. Open the email and follow described instructions to vote.

Robinhood:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúnoreply@robinhood.com Tesla‚Äù. Open the email and click VOTE.

Interactive Brokers:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúinteractivebrokers@proxydocs.com Tesla‚Äù. Open the email and follow described instructions.

Charles Schwab:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúid@proxyvote.com Tesla‚Äù. Additionally, you can log into your brokerage account, use the keywords ‚Äòproxy events‚Äô in the search bar and navigate to proxy events. Alternatively, search for a 16-digit control number in your postal mail. Visit¬†
http://
proxyvote.com¬†and submit your 16-digit control number to vote.

Morgan Stanley/E*Trade:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúid@proxyvote.com Tesla‚Äù. Open the email and follow described instructions.

Merrill Lynch:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúid@proxyvote.com Tesla‚Äù. The email may come from one of several different addresses so please search your inbox for ‚ÄúTesla‚Äù as well. Open the email and follow described instructions.

Vanguard Brokerage:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: ‚Äúid@proxyvote.com Tesla‚Äù. Open the email and follow described instructions.

J.P. Morgan:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Search for an email received in 2025 using the following keywords: "id@proxyvote.com Tesla" Open the email and follow described instructions. If you cannot locate this email, contact JPM support at 888-938-4409 to learn how to vote.

All Other Brokerages:
‚Ä¢ To cast your vote online, you‚Äôll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account). Try searching for each of these three terms to see if you can locate an email from your broker sent in 2025:
‚Äúid@proxyvote.com Tesla‚Äù
‚Äú@proxydocs.com Tesla‚Äù
‚Äú
@saytechnologies
.com Tesla‚Äù
If you find an email, open it and follow described instructions.

International $TSLA holders:
Some brokers outside of the U.S. don‚Äôt allow retail shareholders to vote. If you have not received any voting instructions, please contact your broker to confirm if they provide for proxy voting and, if so, to request such instructions. If you have any additional questions regarding how to vote, please contact Tesla's proxy solicitor, Innisfree M&A Incorporated, at (877) 717-3936 (from the United States or Canada) or +1 (412) 232-3651 (from other locations). Sometimes, when you don't participate in proxy voting, brokers may exercise their discretion to cast votes on your behalf, so be proactive!

General info:
If you cannot locate any emails, try voting by mail, phone or QR code. If you have not received any instructions whether via email or by mail, contact your broker as soon as possible to request such instructions. More info here:
‚Ä¢¬†Vote by phone: 
https://
votetesla.com/how-to-vote/vo
te-by-phone/
‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢¬†Vote by QR code: 
https://
votetesla.com/how-to-vote/vo
te-by-qr-code/
‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢¬†Vote by mail: 
https://
votetesla.com/how-to-vote/vo
te-by-mail/
‚Ä¶

Every vote counts, whether you own one share or many. Make your voices heard. It only takes a few minutes.

Reminder: You must have been a Tesla shareholder as of the September 15th record date to be able to vote.

Tesla's shareholder meeting will take place on November 6, 2025 in Austin, Texas. Voting is now open, so go vote!
